name: Soul Arcanum
description:
You are dead, or at least you thought so. Fight your way trough your inner darkness to save your soul.

 Game contains nine levels plus one survival level which is available after completing the story levels.

Game contains cartoon blood and violence.

Game is tested using ultra graphics on:

Processor:Intel core i5

RAM: 8Gb

Video Memory: 4Gb

Required free disk space: 1.13 GB

Graphics can be set to (Very Low, Low, Medium, High, Very high and Ultra)

Full credits in the actual game.

Please leave a comment  :)

Installation:

1. Unzip File

2. In files go to SoulArcanum1.0   -> SoulArcanumGame  -> Output[INSTALLATION]

3. Choose SoulArcanum_SETUP

4. Run the installation program.
